page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: MOST OF THE HOUSES IN KILMICHAEL -GLASSARY ARE COTTAGE-TYPE HOUSES BUILT EITHER BY THE LOCAL COUNCIL OR THE FORESTRY COMMISSION IN THE 1950'S AND ARE RENTED TO COUNCIL TENANTS OR FORESTRY EMPLOYEES. THE OLDER HOUSES IN THE VILLAGE ARE THE MANSE (OCCUPIED BY THE LOCAL CHURCH OF SCOTLAND MINISTER) AND THE SCHOOLHOUSE (OCCUPIED BY THE HEAD TEACHER OF THE SCHOOL).THESE TWO HOUSES ARE TIED-HOUSES, THAT IS, THE HOUSE IS TIED TO THE JOB. THERE ARE FEW PRIVATELY-OWNED HOUSES IN THE VILLAGE. THOSE WHICH ARE, ARE OLD AND ARE DISPERSED AT INTERVALS ALONG THE KILMICHAEL GLEN ROAD. THE LARGEST HOUSE IN THIS AREA IS { {KIRNAN HOUSE}IN THE GROUNDS OF WHICH WERE ONCE WORLD FAMOUS ROCK GARDENS
